intro: Psychotria edaphothrix, commonly known as the "earth-hugging psychotria," is a species of flowering plant native to the rainforests of Central and South America. This plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves that grow close to the ground, adapted to thrive in shaded, humid environments.
